thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 13 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Century Communities Reports Q4 EPS Of $0.60

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Century Communities Reports Q4 EPS Of $0.60
text:
Feb 13 (Reuters) - Century Communities Inc:
* CENTURY COMMUNITIES REPORTS RECORD FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS
* Q4 HOME SALES REVENUE ROSE 77 PERCENT TO $516.5 MILLION * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.01 EXCLUDING ITEMS * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.60 * QTRLY ‍BACKLOG IMPROVED 76% TO 1,320 HOMES​ * QTRLY ‍BACKLOG VALUE INCREASED 89% TO $572.9 MILLION​ * CENTURY COMMUNITIES-‍EXPECT HOME DELIVERIES TO BE IN RANGE OF 4,500 TO 5,000 HOMES & HOME SALES REVENUES TO BE IN RANGE OF $1.75 BILLION TO $2 BILLION​ IN 2018
* QTRLY TOTAL REVENUES $523.9 MILLION VERSUS $297.3 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
